title: <![CDATA[ Zee News ]]>
textBody: <![CDATA[ According to NASA the odds of injury from the falling debris of the 38-year-old satellite is about 1-in-9,400.  ]]>

title: <![CDATA[ NASA's 38-year-old satellite ERBS to fall from sky this weekend, is it going to hit earth? Read details]]>
textBody: <![CDATA[  Union Minister Dr Jitendra Singh on Wednesday (December 21, 2022) said that India's maiden human space flight 'Gaganyaan' is targeted to be launched in the fourth quarter of 2024.  ]]>

title: <![CDATA[ Gaganyaan, India's maiden human space flight, targeted for launch in 2024]]>
textBody: <![CDATA[ China's Shenzhou-15 spaceship atop the Long March-2F Y15 carrier rocket took off with three astronauts for the country's under-construction space station.   ]]>

title: <![CDATA[ China successfully launches three astronauts for its under-construction space station ]]>
textBody: <![CDATA[ NASA's new moon rocket blasted off and marked the start of its Artemis lunar-exploration programme, named after Apollo's mythological twin sister.  ]]>

title: <![CDATA[ NASA's Artemis rocket lifts off on test flight to moon, begins 'new chapter' in human lunar exploration - WATCH]]>
textBody: <![CDATA[ NASA's moon rocket Artemis I  had been stowed away for weeks after issues with fuel leaks that thwarted the first two launch attempts and then a hurricane Ian rolled through Florida, forcing the rocket to vacate the launchpad and head for safety.  ]]>

title: <![CDATA[ NASA to re-attempt launching moon rocket Artemis I on Nov 14]]>
textBody: <![CDATA[ The latest images released by NASA show the sun with a smile on its face, let's find out the spooky details of outer space.  ]]>

title: <![CDATA[ From the sun's 'evil smile' to the red lightning,  the spooky pictures by NASA]]>
textBody: <![CDATA[ ISRO's heaviest rocket LVM3-M2 successfully placed 36 broadband communication satellites around 75 minutes after the rocket blasted off from the spaceport in Sriharikota.  ]]>

title: <![CDATA[ ISRO scripts history, its heaviest rocket LVM3-M2 successfully places all 36 satellites]]>
textBody: <![CDATA[ Freshwater species populations have plunged by 83% on average since 1970 that accounts for the largest fall of any species group as per the Living Planet Report 2022.  ]]>

title: <![CDATA[ Wildlife in 'grave danger', biodiversity declined by 69% since 1970, warns WWF]]>
textBody: <![CDATA[ The GSLV MK3 rocket is a three-stage heavy lift launch vehicle developed by ISRO and it will be used for its first-ever commercial launch after successfully flying four Indian national missions till date.  ]]>
